attributes.action: Stop booking system with household recycling centres
attributes.additional_details: Fly tipping has increased due to the booking system, appointments are few and far between, and most people using the centres need to do more than one trip
attributes.background: Change household recycling centres back to drive through

rejection.details:
Decisions about local waste collection, including whether to have a booking system for recycling centres, are a matter for indiviudal local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
